tiles.title: Drip Irrigation
tiles.description: Drip Irrigation saves water and energy, and improves yields

tiles.title: Spares & after Sales Services
tiles.description: Our products are supported with all the necessary spare parts and our team of engineers are readily available for technical support. Contact us at a branch near you. Mbale, Gulu, Arua, Mbarara, Lyantonde, Jinja, Kampala, Hoima and more.

tiles.title: Generators and Water Pumps
tiles.description: We offer generators and water pumps and accessories like hose pipes etc both for agricultural and construction works. We do both outdoor and household plumbing.
